mapper.sql: cloud_id, id, project_id, name, created_at, updated_at, description, revision_number, ee_status, ee_bp, ee_user, shared, ee_name
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from tbl_cmp_os_securitygroups
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_cmp_os_securitygroups (cloud_id, id, project_id, name, created_at, updated_at, description, revision_number, ee_status, ee_bp, ee_user, shared, ee_name) values (#{cloudId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{projectId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createdAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updatedAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{revisionNumber,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{eeStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{eeBp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{eeUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{shared,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{eeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

id,

ee_status,

mapper.update:
update tbl_cmp_os_securitygroups
cloud_id = #{record.cloudId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
id = #{record.id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
project_id = #{record.projectId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
name = #{record.name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
created_at = #{record.createdAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
updated_at = #{record.updatedAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
description = #{record.description,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
revision_number = #{record.revisionNumber,jdbcType=BIGINT},
ee_status = #{record.eeStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER},
ee_bp = #{record.eeBp,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ee_user = #{record.eeUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
shared = #{record.shared,jdbcType=SMALLINT},
ee_name = #{record.eeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

update tbl_cmp_os_securitygroups set cloud_id = #{record.cloudId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, id = #{record.id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, project_id = #{record.projectId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, name = #{record.name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, created_at = #{record.createdAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, updated_at = #{record.updatedAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, description = #{record.description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, revision_number = #{record.revisionNumber,jdbcType=BIGINT}, ee_status = #{record.eeStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ee_bp = #{record.eeBp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ee_user = #{record.eeUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, shared = #{record.shared,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, ee_name = #{record.eeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update tbl_cmp_os_securitygroups
project_id = #{projectId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
created_at = #{createdAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
updated_at = #{updatedAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
revision_number = #{revisionNumber,jdbcType=BIGINT},
ee_status = #{eeStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER},
ee_bp = #{eeBp,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ee_user = #{eeUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
shared = #{shared,jdbcType=SMALLINT},
ee_name = #{eeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where cloud_id = #{cloudId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update tbl_cmp_os_securitygroups set project_id = #{projectId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, created_at = #{createdAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, updated_at = #{updatedAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, revision_number = #{revisionNumber,jdbcType=BIGINT}, ee_status = #{eeStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ee_bp = #{eeBp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ee_user = #{eeUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, shared = #{shared,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, ee_name = #{eeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where cloud_id = #{cloudId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select id from tbl_cmp_os_securitygroups where cloud_id = #{cloudId} and ee_status != -1

select cloud_id, id, project_id, name, created_at, updated_at, description, revision_number, ee_status, ee_bp, ee_user, shared, ee_name from ( select t1.security_group_id from tbl_cmp_os_securitygroupportbindings t1 left join tbl_cmp_os_ports t2 on t1.port_id = t2.id where t2.device_id = #{instanceUuid} and t1.cloud_id = #{cloudId} and t1.ee_status != -1 and t2.cloud_id = #{cloudId} and t2.ee_status != -1 ) t3 left join tbl_cmp_os_securitygroups t4 on t3.security_group_id = t4.id where t4.cloud_id = #{cloudId} and t4.ee_status != -1
